name: Kindman's: Life After Death
description:
Just because you're dead doesn't mean you can't enjoy a nice everyday life - just drag along!

1 Gameplay Mechanic - 4 very good Scenarios:
GO TO WORK
CLEAN THAT FLOOR
MAYBE TRY SOME YOGA
GO HOME AND SLEEP


made for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 with the theme: 

DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

have fun!
